summary: A playable race that focuses on nature magic.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#00ff00][size=6][b][center]Forest Sprite[/center][/b][/size][/color][/font][center][/center]
[color=#00ff00][size=4]Who are they?[/size][/color]
[color=#00ff00]The Forest Sprites were thought to be the spirit of nature. Just like the Spriggans not much is known about them. However, unlike the Spriggans they seem to have more human like characteristics. Although they still prefer the living in the forests than in the cities.The Forest Sprites are well adapted at the use of magic particularly nature magic.

[color=#ffffff][size=5]What This Mod Does[/size][/color]
[color=#ffffff]Adds a playable race called Forest Sprite. They start with a bonus in the stealth skill and all magic skill except enchanting.[/color] [color=#ffffff]Mod is still being worked on only partly done. All spells should level with the player if you get the respected perks. Since spells level with player based on perks this mod might not work well with other mods that alter the perk trees (only real harm is your starting spells wont level with the player)[/color]
[size=3][color=#ffffff]For those not wanting to make a new character spell tomes can be found in the Temple of Kynareth in Whiterun[/color][/size]
[color=#ffffff]Spells also use a script to make them stronger as you level up the appropriate skill. There is an alternate esp that doesn't have the script in case you already use a mod that increases spell damage like ordinator perk overhaul.
[/color]
[size=4][b][color=#ff0000]Now contains adult content![/color][/b][/size]

[size=4]Spells

[size=3]Destruction:[/size]
[/size]Energy Blast: A blast of pure energy that paralysis the target.
Spell gets stronger as you level up your destruction skill.

Energy Wave: A continuous stream of nature energy that harms the target. When duel cast with Swarm supercharges the bees creating extra effects.
[/color][color=#00ff00][color=#00ff00]Spell gets stronger as you level up your destruction skill.[/color]

Swarm: Command even the insects to attack your target. Insects shout out of your hands causing a stagger effect.
[/color][color=#00ff00][color=#00ff00]Spell gets stronger as you level up your destruction skill.[/color]

[size=3]Alteration:
[size=2]Tree bomb: Grow a tree instantly right under your targets feet.
[/size][/size][/color][color=#00ff00]Spell gets stronger with alteration skill.[/color][color=#00ff00]

Synergy: Use nature magic to activate your summoned trees.
Spell is used to activate trees that are summoned with lesser powers from far away.

[size=3]Conjuration:
[size=2]Nature's Grace: Summon a bound sword with poison nature magic.
[/size][/size][/color][color=#00ff00]Spell gets stronger when you get the following perks- [/color][color=#00ff00]Mystic Binding, Soul Stealer, and Oblivion Binding.

Summon Wolf Spirit: Summons a Wolf Spirit to aid you.
[/color][color=#00ff00]Spell gets stronger when you get the following perks- Summoner30, Atromancy and Elemental Potency.

[/color][color=#00ff00]Summon Bear Spirit: Summons a Bear Spirit to aid you.
[/color][color=#00ff00]Spell gets stronger when you get the following perks- Summoner30, Atromancy and Elemental Potency.

[/color][color=#00ff00]Summon Sabre Cat Spirit: Summons a Sabre Cat Spirit to aid you.
[/color][color=#00ff00]Spell gets stronger when you get the following perks- Summoner30, Atromancy and Elemental Potency.

[size=4]Restoration:[/size]
1. Solar Infinitum: Draw from Nature a Font of Luminescence to Empower Solar Spells.
[/color][color=#00ff00]Empowers all spell with the word "solar" in them[/color][color=#00ff00] 

2. Solar de vivre [Restoration Adept, 110cost]: Restorative light that heals player over time.
[/color][color=#00ff00]Empowered: Heals area[/color][color=#00ff00] 

3. Solar Faible: Inflite damage via Discharge of Latent Energy within Target.[/color][color=#00ff00]
Empowered: Damage area[/color][color=#00ff00] 

4. Solar Arretez: Ensconce Target in an Orb of Light that slows Movement for 3 seconds.[/color][color=#00ff00]
Empowered: Absorb Health, magicka + stamina[/color][color=#00ff00] 

5. Solar Finalis: Generate a burst of Fiery Light to damage enemies at target location.[/color][color=#00ff00]
Empowered: Heavily slow the target area[/color][color=#00ff00]

 6. Solar Lumiere: Launch a flare of Solar Energy that burns.
[/color][color=#00ff00]Empowered: Damage area

   7. Solar de eclat: Solar Nova that does damage in an area.
Empowered: Paralyze area

   8. Solar de rayon: A beam of light that does damage per second.
Empowered: Slightly slow target

[size=3][size=4]Lesser Powers:[/size]
[size=2]Nature Shift: Shift your physical self into the spirit realm becoming invisible and unable to take damage.[/size]
[/size]Spell gets stronger when you get the following perks- Sealth1, Stealth2, Stealth3, Stealth4, and Stealth5

Grow Sacred Tree: Summon a sacred tree next to you. Tree can calm nearby enemies when activated.
(warning spell still being worked on doesn't always work like it's supposed to)

[/color][color=#00ff00]Grow Poison Aspen Tree: Summon a poison aspen tree next to you. Tree can poison all those nearby when activated.
(warning spell still being worked on doesn't always work like it's supposed to can kill PC)

[/color][color=#00ff00]Grow Healing Pine Tree: Summon a healing pine tree next to you. Tree [/color][color=#00ff00][color=#00ff00]can heal all those nearby when activated.
[/color](warning spell still being worked on doesn't always work like it's supposed to)

Channel Energy: Weaves Magical Energy from the Atmosphere. Empowers Energy Blast in Meaningful Ways. The spell "Energy Blast" will have additional effect.

Lifting Gale: Sprint along Nature's Wind-Path to increase Movement Speed for 30 seconds.[/color]
[size=4]
Requirements
[size=3]Dawnguard
Dragonborn[/size][/size][size=3]
RaceCompatibility for Skyrim and Dawnguard

Special Thanks To
ISHARAMERADIN for helping me write the scripts
lonleytree91 for helping me create and test spells
[/size]
[color=#ff0000][size=5]Credits
[/size][/color][color=#ff0000][size=5]Better males by Chris57

Runic eyes by ArtByMari
[color=#980000][size=3]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76456/?[/size][/color]
TDN Equipable Horns by TheDNightshade
[color=#980000][size=3]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57198/?[/size][/color]
unp blessed by xp32

author: MMFT93

files.name: Forest Sprite Race
files.changelogHtml:
Added 3 new spells
Nature's grace - summon bound sword with poison effect sword textures still need to be fixed though
Swarm - the spell the spriggans use
Energy Wave - basically stonger and retextured version of vinilla spell sparks

Also tweaked some spells made
1. Tree Bomb go farther so can cast from further away and shouldn't stagger PC any more
2.Nature Shift shouldn't cause invisible eye glitch anymore should work with Invisible eye glitch mod
3. added corrupted nature spells for when you turn into vampire but spells sometimes don't show up needs fix

files.name: Forest Sprite Race
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed some spells not leveling the player. Also made each spell get stronger depending on the perks the player chooses so now player can use them at higher levels.

For those not wanting to make a new character I added some spell tomes with the spells in the temple in whiterun.

Included 3 new spells. Spells are still in testing, while playing with them is possible they don't always work like they're supposed to.

files.name: Forest Sprite
files.changelogHtml: Added a custom look to the race
